last_episode_to_air.name: Ao-chan Can't Study
last_episode_to_air.overview: Ao-chan knows how take her relationship with Kijima to the next level... but it would mean breaking a promise she made to Kijima.

name: Ao-chan Can't Study!
original_name: みだらな青ちゃんは勉強ができない
overview: Ao Horie's father, a popular erotic fiction author, chose Ao's name because A stands for “apple” and O stands for “orgy”! Desperate to escape her father's legacy and get into a prestigious university, Ao devotes herself to studying instead of pursuing romance. She has no time for boys, but there's just one problem: Kijima, her handsome and popular classmate, just confessed his love to her! And to make matters worse, she can't stop thinking dirty thoughts about him! Looks like escaping her father's influence will be harder than she thought...

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: Ao Horie, a top high school student who tries to avoid boys and romance to achieve her dream of living far away from her father, an erotic novelist. Her plans are derailed when a handsome classmate, Takumi Kijima, confesses his love for her, causing her to become flustered and have embarrassing, sexually charged thoughts about him. The twelve-episode season details their awkward and often humorous interactions as Ao struggles to focus on her studies despite her conflicting feelings and confused desires.
